data.actual_result: Your screen goes back, until you re-open overlay, and close the video out of full screen.
data.expected_result: The video should close out with the overlay.
data.short_description: Closing a video that is in full screen while in overlay will give you a black screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game. - Open Overlay. - Play a video. - Make the video go to full screen. - Close overlay with Shift + ~.(if you want to get rid of the black screen, re-open overlay and close the video out of full screen.)
